Apache NLPCraft - Java Client 0.7.5
  • All Classes
 

Package org.apache.nlpcraft.client

NLPCraft Java Client API - provides native wrapper for REST APIs for any JVM-based languages like Java, Scala, Kotlin or Groovy.

Usage
Java client usage is straightforward - create client instance using NCClientBuilder and use the client instance for all API calls: 

     // Get client instance with all defaults.
     NCClient cli = new NCClientBuilder().build();

     // Perform any necessary calls...
     NCResult res = cli.askSync("my.model.id", txt);

     // Close client & sign out at the end.
     cli.close();
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    NCClient
    Java client API provides native JVM wrapper for NLPCraft REST APIs.
    NCCompany
    Company descriptor.
    NCFeedback
    Feedback record descriptor.
    NCModel
    Data model descriptor.
    NCNewCompany
    New company descriptor.
    NCProbe
    Data probe descriptor.
    NCResult
    Request result descriptor.
    NCSuggestion
    Individual synonym suggestion returned from NCSuggestionData.getSynonyms() method.
    NCSuggestionData
    Result container returned by NCClient.suggestSynonyms(String, Double) method.
    NCUser
    User record descriptor.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    NCClientBuilder
    Builder for the NCClient instances.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    NCClientException
    Java client exception.
